code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule(
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    input logic cin,
    output logic cout,
    output logic sum
);

    // Combinational logic for full adder
    always @(*) begin
        sum = a ^ b ^ cin; // XOR operation for sum
        cout = (a & b) | (b & cin) | (a & cin); // Carry-out logic using OR and AND operations
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
```
